title: Read the label and live! - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Lee Rhoads and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Stressed the importance of reading labels on commonly used products and heeding the warnings and instructions on them. Dramatic sequences emphasize the most common problems that result when people do not read labels. Also details safe handling practices for hair sprays, insecticides, paint thinners, medicines and other household products.
